briefTitle: Use of Axillary Ultrasound to Guide Breast Cancer Management in the Genomic Assay Era
officialTitle: Use of Axillary Ultrasound to Guide Breast Cancer Management in the Genomic Assay Era: A Retrospective Cohort Study
primaryOutcomeMeasure: the number of abnormal nodes on ultrasound
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* breast cancer patients with T1-3, HR-positive and HER2-negative disease.
* aged≥ 50 years old
* had axillary ultrasound prior to operation
* axillary lymph node dissection

Exclusion Criteria:

* Patients with neoadjuvant chemotherapy
* bilateral cancers
